derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bydel 'a person who makes a proclamation', gradually superseded in Middle English  by forms from Old French bedel, ultimately of Germanic origin; related to German Büttel, also bidCompare with bedel

means.word_mean: 1. a minor parish official who serves as an usher and preserves order at services
